meaning: meeting, meet, party, association, interview, join

onyomiExamples.meaning: meeting, assembly, party, gathering, conference, athletic meet, society, association, club
slight bow (as a greeting or sign of gratitude), nod, salutation, consideration, thoughtfulness

imperial event at which high monks recited the Golden Light Sutra to pray for national security and good harvests (held annually at the palace from the 8th to the 14th of the first lunar month, between the Nara and Muromachi periods)

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to meet, to encounter, to see, to have an accident, to have a bad experience

kunyomiExamples.reading: あうはわかれのはじめ
kunyomiExamples.meaning: we meet only to part, meeting is the first step to parting
to make (someone) to meet, to let (someone) meet, to expose to, to subject to
